title: Novak Djokovic was granted vaccine exemption after testing positive for Covid-19 in December, court documents show
content:
1. Novak Djokovic was granted vaccine exemption after testing positive for Covid-19 in December, court documents show  CNN
  2. Djokovic's Australian Open Covid vaccine debacle is self-made martyrdom  NBCNews.com
  3. Opinion: Djokovic dropped from Australian Open over vaccine status. It needed to be done  Detroit Free Press
  4. Australians should be mad at their government's strict lockdowns, not Djokovic's vaccine exemption  Washington Examiner
  5. Djokovic saga highlights Australia's border obsession  Nikkei Asia
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ノバク・ジョコビッチは12月にCovid-19の陽性反応を示した後、ワクチン免除を受けたことが裁判資料で明らかになった
法庭文件显示，诺瓦克-德约科维奇在12月对科维德-19检测呈阳性后被授予疫苗豁免权
法庭文件顯示，諾瓦克-德約科維奇在12月對科維德-19檢測呈陽性後被授予疫苗豁免權
